name: Stealy Wheely Automobiley
description:
This is a submission for the Awful Summer Jam 2018.

Stealy Wheely Automobiley is an unnecessary sequel to GTA, set in the times of Queen Victoria in the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland. You are a person who has decided to become a thief, except in those times thieves just rampaged through houses, stealing everything and brutally murdering everyone in their way. Does that sound like fun? Because that's what you will be doing, either in a sandbox or in 4 unique quests!

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

Shift - Run

E - Interact (Equip gun, go on bike, open door, steal stuff)

LMB - Shoot / Punch (If you don't have a gun)

While on Bike:

W / Up arrow key - Accelerate

S / Down arrow keys - Go back

A & D / Left and right arrow keys - Turn

Q - Get off bike

Credits:

Programming, Game design, Level design, Sound design - NNNIKKI

Art - Beowulf

Music - misotanni
